title: I feel like we should have seen some 9.14 notes by now?
body:
Where are they?

Anyone got any dirt on this?  Link?

replies.body:
For anyone who is confused, go check out the ***official*** patch schedule here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360018987893-League-of-Legends-patch-schedule

It will tell you when each patch is planned for release, patch notes typically a day or so before that.

[Surrender@20](https://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html)
It's 2019. Everyone should know about that website.
Well aware of it.  Can’t find current TFT changes in any official capacity though.

> [{quoted}](name=Barkley,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1NOs3ata,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-07-15T05:31:04.168+0000)
>
> Can’t find current TFT changes in any official capacity though.

Those can be found in a different place: [TFTactics](https://tftactics.gg/news/patch-9.14-pbe-changes)
Those are as official as you can get.
######Much like Surrender@20 isn't official, but does a great job.
To my knowledge it comes out on the 17th, so patch notes will most likely be on the 16th.
They’ll probably be out on Monday or Tuesday.

Patches are every 2 weeks but if I remember right they do one 3 week patch cycle each year.

Maybe a couple? But it isn't unprecedented.
